name: The Explorer DEMO
description:
WE LOST ON AN UNKNOWN PLANET AND ADVENT US IN A NEW JOURNEY! (Demo version hides the story)

  • SO: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent Second generation
  • Memory: 4 GB de RAM
  • Graphics card: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB of available space
